tool_description: Estimates covariance matrices using various methodologies including sample covariance, shrinkage estimators, and robust estimators.
error_messages: Insufficient assets: Need at least 2 assets for covariance estimation.
Invalid estimation method: Use one of [sample, shrinkage, robust, ewma].
Invalid shrinkage target: Use one of [identity, single_factor, constant_correlation].
Singular matrix: Covariance matrix is not positive definite, try a different estimation method.
usage: Provide asset symbols with return data and specify estimation methodology. Returns covariance matrix and estimation diagnostics.

matrix_rank.description: Rank of the estimated covariance matrix

is_positive_definite.description: Whether the matrix is positive definite
